arStrings.szText:
Shadow damage infects enemies with {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:DEBUFF_SHADOWBLIGHT_COUNTER}{/c} seconds. You and your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage to enemies with {c_important}Shadowblight{/c}.

Every {c_number}{SF_2}th{/c} time an enemy receives Shadow damage from you or your Minions while they are affected by {c_important}Shadowblight{/c}, they take an additional {c_number}{payload:BURST_DAMAGE}{/c} Shadow damage.
